welcome_message_body: Welcome to Heguri, a charming city known for its beautiful temples and stunning nature. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all that this lovely city has to offer. Happy travels!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: The free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration or login.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but a registration is required.
